hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.tagline: Modern Web Solutions, Built to Scale
hero.description: Passionate about building scalable web applications, crafting modern interfaces, and delivering solutions that empower businesses.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I graduated in 2020 from the University of Computer Studies, Thaton, with a major in Computer Science. Since then, I have been working as a Web Developer, gaining over 4 years of professional experience in building web applications and backend systems.
about.details: I have contributed to projects using a wide range of technologies including PHP, React, Vue, C#, HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Git, and SourceTree. My technical expertise covers coding, responsive design, browser testing, and mobile-friendly development.
about.experience: I am experienced in both small and large teams, consistently ensuring project efficiency and high-quality outcomes. With strong problem-solving skills and a keen eye for detail, I strive to deliver modern, reliable, and high-performance solutions.

projects.title: POS System
projects.description: A sale and inventory management system with barcode scanning and receipt generation.

projects.title: Media Management System
projects.description: An advertising and report management system for media with analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Glove Simulation System
projects.description: A 3D configurator for customizing and ordering baseball gloves with real-time preview.

projects.title: Travel and Tour System
projects.description: A comprehensive system for managing tour packages, bookings, and customer relationships.

projects.title: Evaluation Management System Administrator and App
projects.description: A system for the evaluation of shop managers and staff, including commitments and MVP points.

projects.title: Class Management System
projects.description: A system for the management of students, classes, courses, and schedules.

projects.title: Online Order Management System
projects.description: A system for ordering kitchen products and managing payment data.

projects.title: Online Translation System
projects.description: A system for managing Japanese translation services.

projects.title: Professional Craftsmen Borrowing System
projects.description: A platform that connects clients directly with skilled carpenters for small construction projects, cutting out middlemen and extra costs.

projects.title: Excel Importer
projects.description: A system that manages Excel upload files, upload patterns, and imports data.

hero.title: フルスタック開発者
hero.tagline: 現代のウェブのためのスケーラブルなウェブソリューションを構築しています。
hero.description: ビジネスを強化するスケーラブルなウェブアプリケーションを構築し、現代のインターフェースを創造し、ソリューションを提供することに熱意があります。
hero.contactButton: 私と連絡を取りましょう

categories: ウェブサイトデザイン

about.title: 私について
about.intro: 私は2020年にタトンのコンピュータ大学を卒業し、コンピュータサイエンスを専攻しました。それ以来、ウェブ開発者として4年以上の経験を積み、ウェブアプリケーションやバックエンドシステムの構築に従事しています。
about.details: 私は PHP、リアクト、Vue、C#、HTML、CSS、SCSS、JavaScript、jQuery、Git などの幅広い技術を用いたプロジェクトに貢献してきました。技術的な専門知識にはコーディング、レスポンシブデザイン、ブラウザテスト、モバイルフレンドリー開発が含まれます。
about.experience: 私は小規模チームおよび大規模チームの両方で経験があり、プロジェクトの効率性と高品質な成果を常に確保しています。問題解決能力が高く、細部への注意力を持ち、モダンで信頼性の高い高性能ソリューションを提供することを目指しています。
